Query:
SELECT 
    			BC.BRANCHNAME, 
    			S.FIRSTNAME CUSTOMERNAME,
				SM.MDN MDN,
				ET.DISPLAYTEXT STATUS,
				P.TRADENAME AGENTNAME, 
				P.PARTNERCODE AGENTCODE,
				TO_CHAR(SM.CREATETIME , 'DD/MM/YYYY') CREATEDATE,
				TO_CHAR(SM.CREATETIME , 'HH24:MI') CREATETIME,
				S.APPROVEDORREJECTEDBY APPROVEDBY,
				TO_CHAR(S.APPROVEORREJECTTIME , 'DD/MM/YYYY') APPROVEDDATE,
				TO_CHAR(S.APPROVEORREJECTTIME , 'HH24:MI') APPROVEDTIME
			FROM 
				SUBSCRIBER S,
				SUBSCRIBER_MDN SM,
				ENUM_TEXT ET,
				BRANCHCODES BC,
				PARTNER P,
				MFINO_USER MU
			WHERE
				S.ID = SM.SUBSCRIBERID
				AND ET.TAGID='5155'
				AND ET.ENUMCODE = SM.STATUS
				AND BC.ID = MU.BRANCHCODEID
				AND P.ID = S.REGISTERINGPARTNERID
				AND MU.ID = P.USERID
				AND SM.LASTUPDATETIME >= ${StartTime}
				AND SM.LASTUPDATETIME <= ${EndTime};
